page.title: 03Acle
page.content: In our part of Acle there are a few houses, some old and some new. They also had a Police Station and a Railway Station by the main road.They have a market which sells a variety of things but it was not in our block.The High School was in our block but it is not on the main road. We interviewed people in Acle and all said they would like a bypass so it obviously needs a bypass.We also found that the most popular place for weekly shopping, half-yearly items and occasional items were either Norwich or Yarmouth. Some people shopped for occasional items in Acle and Acle market.No one shopped for things like furniture in Acle even though there was a small furniture shop next to the garrage.
